help.title: BeamJoy commands :
help.langDescription: Show current or change console language
help.mapDescription: Show current or switch to map
help.envDescription: Show or change an environment value
help.whitelistDescription: Show or set whitelist state, add or remove player from whitelist
help.setgroupDescription: Add a player to a group
help.stopDescription: Stop server properly (warns players before kicking them, then exit)

players.cannotSpawnVehicle: You are not allowed to spawn vehicle
players.walkNotAllowed: Walking is not allowed right now

rx.vehicleRemoveSuffix: {typeVehicleRemove} has been removed by a staff member !
rx.vehicleRemoveAll: All your vehicles have been removed by a staff member !

voteKick.beenVoteKick: You have been voteKicked by {votersAmount} players

mapSwitch.kickIn: The map is about to change, you will be kicked in {delay}
mapSwitch.kick: The map has changed, please reconnect

commands.title: Commands
commands.helpDesc: Print this message, or show the help for the specified command
commands.pmDesc: Send a private message to someone (player_name is insensitive and can be a subpart)

errors.modManagementDisabled: Mod management is disabled on this server !
errors.cannotSpawnAnyMoreVeh: You cannot spawn any more vehicle
errors.cannotStartWodeWithAI: You cannot start this mode with an AI vehicle

events.voteDenied: Vote for {voteEvent}{suffix} denied: not enough voters
events.voteCancelledByCreator: Vote for {voteEvent}{suffix} cancelled by the creator

edit.title: Edit
edit.raceDeleteModal: Are you sure you want to delete the race "{raceName}"

config.title: Config
config.stopModal: Are you sure you want to restart the server ?

themeEditor.cancelModal: Changes will not be saved. Are you sure you want to cancel ?
themeEditor.resetAllModal: You are about to revert the server theme to factory settings. Are you sure you want to proceed?

vehicles.automaticLightsTooltip: Toggle headlights automatically based on the time of day (and turn police lightbar on during pursuits)

moderationBlock.kickModal: Are you sure you want to kick "{playerName}" ?
moderationBlock.tempBanModal: Are you sure you want to temp ban "{playerName}" ?
moderationBlock.banModal: Are you sure you want to ban "{playerName}" ?

race.title: Race Settings
race.PreparationTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds before the race starts
race.VoteTimeoutTooltip: Duration of the vote in seconds
race.VoteThresholdRatioTooltip: The required ratio of voters among all server players to start the race
race.GridReadyTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds before players can mark as ready within grid step (to prevent players from starting the race before opponents can join, must be lower than "Grid Stage Duration")
race.GridTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds while players can join, select a vehicle and mark ready. When timed out, the race starts or cancels itself.
race.RaceCountdownTooltip: Delay between all race participants marked ready and the actual race starts
race.FinishTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds between a player finishes and becomes a spectator
race.RaceEndTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds between the last race player finishes and the race ends

broadcasts.title: Broadcasts
broadcasts.tooltip: Messages broadcasted regularly to all players having the corresponding language.

welcomeMessage.title: Welcome Message
welcomeMessage.tooltip: Message displayed to joining players. If empty, fallback language is used.

speed.title: Speed Gamemode Settings
speed.PreparationTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds while players can switch to their vehicle before the mode starts
speed.VoteTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds while players can join and leave before the mode starts
speed.StepSpeedTooltip: Speed increase in km/h per step
speed.EndTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds between last players finish and the mode ends

hunter.title: Hunter Gamemode Settings
hunter.PreparationTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds before the game starts
hunter.VoteTimeoutTooltip: Duration of the vote in seconds
hunter.VoteThresholdRatioTooltip: The required ratio of voters among all server players to start the game
hunter.GridTimeoutTooltip: Timeout in seconds for any player to join, select a vehicle and mark ready. When a player marks ready, the timeout is removed.
hunter.HuntedStuckTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds the fugitive must be stuck for hunters to win
hunter.HuntersRespawnDelayTooltip: Time in seconds hunters are stuck when they respawn
hunter.HuntedResetRevealDurationTooltip: Duration in seconds the fugitive is revealed to all hunters after a vehicle reset (Disabled when set to 0)
hunter.HuntedRevealProximityDistanceTooltip: Maximum distance in meters any hunter must be from the fugitive to reveal its position to all others (Disabled when set to 0)
hunter.HuntedResetDistanceThresholdTooltip: Minimum distance in meters the fugitive must be from any hunter to reset (Resetting is disabled when set to 0)
hunter.EndTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds between last players finish and the mode ends

infected.title: Infected Gamemode Settings
infected.PreparationTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds before the game starts
infected.VoteTimeoutTooltip: Duration of the vote in seconds
infected.VoteThresholdRatioTooltip: The required ratio of voters among all server players to start the game
infected.GridTimeoutTooltip: Timeout in seconds for any player to join, select a vehicle and mark ready. When a player marks ready, the timeout is removed.
infected.InfectedStartDelayTooltip: Countdown in seconds for the infected player
infected.EndTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds between the finish trigger and the mode ends

derby.title: Destruction Derby Settings
derby.PreparationTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds before the derby starts
derby.VoteTimeoutTooltip: Duration of the vote in seconds
derby.VoteThresholdRatioTooltip: The required ratio of voters among all server players to start the game
derby.GridTimeoutTooltip: Timeout in seconds for any player to join, select a vehicle and mark ready. When a player marks ready, the timeout is removed.
derby.StartCountdownTooltip: Time in seconds before the derby starts
derby.DestroyedTimeoutTooltip: Duration in seconds before a stuck/wrecked player gets eliminated
derby.EndTimeoutTooltip: Time in seconds between last players finish and the mode ends

reputation.title: Reputation
reputation.ArrestRewardTooltip: Applicable when arresting a player during a pursuit
reputation.EvadeRewardTooltip: Applicable when evading the police with success
reputation.DeliveryPackageStreakRewardTooltip: Will be multiplied by current streak and added to base reward
reputation.RaceWinnerRewardTooltip: Applied only to multiplayer races, divided by the player position in race
reputation.RaceRecordRewardTooltip: Only applicable if a record was previously set
reputation.HunterWinnerRewardTooltip: Applies to every players in the winning team (hunters or fugitive)
reputation.DerbyWinnerRewardTooltip: Will be divided by the player position in the leaderboard
reputation.TagDuoRewardTooltip: Applied when tagging the opponent in a duo lobby

permissions.title: Groups & Permissions
permissions.deleteModal: Are you sure you want to delete the group "{groupName}"?

core.title: Core
core.Name: Name
core.NameTooltip: How players will see your server in the browser
core.DescriptionTooltip: What players will see when they click your server in the browser
core.MaxPlayersTooltip: Maximum number of players allowed in the server
core.PrivateTooltip: When activated, your server is not visible in the browser
core.DebugTooltip: Will activate debug mode and allow you to see and do a lot of things
core.InformationPacketTooltip: Allow unconnected clients to get the public server information without joining

formattingHints.title: Formatting Hints (only applied on Name and Description)

new.title: New Map
new.name: Tech Name
new.nameTooltip: Corresponding to the map's folder name, inside the archive

cen.title: Console/Editor/NodeGrabber
cen.tooltip: CEN are always accessibles for Admin+

votekick.voteAboutToEnd: The vote is about to end

votemap.hasStarted: has started a vote to switch to map
votemap.voteAboutToEnd: The vote is about to end

freeroamSettings.resetDelayTooltip: Duration in seconds before a player can reset
freeroamSettings.teleportDelayTooltip: Duration in seconds before a player can teleport to another
freeroamSettings.emergencyRefuelDurationTooltip: Duration of emergency refueling process in seconds
freeroamSettings.cancelModal: You will lose your unsaved changes, are you sure you want to close the window ?

edit.name: Name

edit.stepsFinishWarning: THE FINISH / LAP IS THE LAST STEP
edit.parentStartTooltip: You can use "start" in next steps to branch from the start too
edit.hasRecordConfirm: A record has been set on this race and saving will delete it. Are you sure ?
edit.saveErrorToast: Race save failed, please try again or contact the administrator
edit.reverseConfirm: Reversing will remove your race intelligence and you will need to check every waypoint again. Are you sure you want to proceed ?

buttons.toggleLoopable: Toggle between circuit and point-to-point race

settings.manyLapsWarning: A large amount of laps can cause performance issues
